data.title1: Sharing and meeting has never been so easy
data.subTitle1: See what your friends are up to
data.text1: The plans of all your friends in one overview
data.subTitle2: Joining is just one click away
data.text2: Time-saving, so that you have more time for yourself and for your friends. Make the most of your day, with Humally!
data.text3: In a clear overview, app users see activities from other app users who are nearby. Know that you are always invited to respond.
data.text4: You can view the public profile of everyone who logs in. Get to know each other through a joint activity or chat first in the app and see if it clicks.
data.text5: Safe chatting with all your friends
data.text6: Show who you are, with your own profile
data.text7: All notifications are clearly arranged in your inbox
data.text8: No data to third parties. Safety first.
data.text9: All messages you see are recent
data.text11: Easy settings; make the app yours
